item.description:
Hi everyone,

There are a few of us heading for a biking weekend on Cape Cod on June 13 - 14.

The plan is to get the fast ferry to Province town on the Saturday morning at 9am, cycle to Eastham and stay overnight and cycle back to P town on the Sunday, spend a few hours drinking and relaxing before getting the ferry back to Boston.

Cycling about 20 - 25 miles each day.

Estimates of cost:
Ferry is $86 return,
accommodation: if we stay at the hostel in Eastham it would cost about $35. But people could stay wherever they liked.

Please rsvp if you are interested, I think accommodation likely to book out.

Cheers,
Amy & Eveline

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Bike weekend - Cape Cod - June 13 to 14
